about_the_game: Qubie is a Community driven platformer about a rectangular alien (Qubie) who is on a mission to take over the galaxy one world at a time. Defeat the various "Squares" and collect all the coins to clear levels and progress. Keep an eye out for special enemy characters. These special enemies are twitch streamers who have helped me and continue to help me throughout the development process. All music that is featured in qubie are original works by myself or my development team, so you can stream Qubie without fear of copyright infringement. We at CodeBreaker Studios encourage community input so please, if you have an idea, share it In the community discussion and we will do our best to implement it.

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent use of Foul Language. Use of Firearms

name: Qubie: Invader of Worlds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: xp, vista
  • Processor: Intel Pentium or Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD A10 APU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

short_description: Qubie is an in-development platformer game designed to bring happiness and joy to all. Squash enemies, collect coins, and avoid various traps to progress through the levels. Oh and try to keep your cool!
